sense.gloss: major incident, major happening, big scandal

sdata.j: これは↑空前↑↓くうぜん↓の↑大↑↓|だい↓↑事件↑↓じけん|↓として↑歴史↑↓れきし↓に↑残↑↓のこ↓るでしょう。
sdata.e: This will go down in history as the greatest event that has ever taken place.

sdata.j: １９９０↑年↑↓ねん↓の↑重大↑↓じゅう|だい↓↑事件↑↓じけん|↓といえば↑何↑↓なに↓でしょう？
sdata.e: What were the chief events of 1990?
